short-reviews: Lenovo N23 2-1 provides great features without fragility
Simple to use and every bit well described.. ...
long-reviews: I’m not in love with it, but I don’t hate it. Screen flexibility is great for streaming shows and for minor presentations/photos. Hard drive space sucks with Windows. I’m constantly nagged by Microsoft about minimal space for updates. I think I hate Windows on the pc more than the pc itself. An external hard drive helps, but only when the product is stationary. A micro SD drive is super helpful for being mobile. Keyboard reaction time is a bit slow at times, and not having a number keyboard is annoying. Touch screen is cool. No DVD drive can easily be remedied with an external one.
I like the touchscreen, the easy but sturdy flipping, the keyboard touch, and the small size.  I've used Lenovo products before and keep coming back.
I love this convertible laptop/tablet. So far, I haven't had any issues. This is my first 2-in-1 and I'm glad I bit the bullet and purchased it!!The battery life is great.
Battery life is extremely poor. Not even enough space for windows updates. Do not BUY!

Awesome physical structure. Really liked this laptop, then accepted the hard drive is almost entirely filled with files that cannot be removed or changed. Wouldn't buy if I knew this before purchasing.  I cleared about 5 gigs off hard drive. Windows had to update, back to 95 percent full. Computers run extremely slow when the hard drive is full, it's been this way since I took it out of the box. I understand for a computer this size,  a 32 gig hard drive is common. You can buy a microsd or usb, but then I am spending more money only to make this one work. I am exchanging this or donating. Then buying a different computer ASAP. Update: tried to uninstall one of the ten updates that couldn't install due to software and hard drive. Been stuck in loading mode 10-15 min, questioning if computer still functional.
Simple to use and every bit well described...thank you!
Pictures are not what shows up, it’s a completly different laptop. Returning immediately.
